dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Ten10 collects and uses the following information:
dataCollection.item1: Account details: Email address, full name (optional), profile picture (optional)
dataCollection.item2: Financial data: Income, expenses, donations, and any other data you record in the system
dataCollection.item3: Usage settings: Language preferences, currency, reminders, and other settings
dataCollection.item4: Usage data: Application activity for service improvement purposes
dataCollection.item5: Contact content: Messages you send through the contact form

web.title: Website Version
web.description: Data is stored on Supabase, a secure cloud service. All data is encrypted and protected using Row Level Security (RLS). Your data is only accessible to you.

desktop.title: Desktop Application
desktop.description: Data is stored locally on your computer in a SQLite file. Data is never sent to external servers. Only you can access your data.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: We use your data for the following purposes:
dataUsage.item1: Providing system services: Tithe calculations, budget management, and reports
dataUsage.item2: Service improvement: Understanding user needs and improving functionality
dataUsage.item3: Reminders: Sending monthly reminders (only if you have opted in)
dataUsage.item4: Technical support: Helping resolve issues and questions

communications.title: Communications
communications.description: If you have chosen to receive email reminders, we will send you monthly messages about your tithe status. You can unsubscribe at any time.
communications.unsubscribe: To unsubscribe, click the link in any reminder email, or contact us at: contact@ten10-app.com

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to track usage on the landing page. This helps us understand how users interact with the site and improve the experience.
analytics.note: Google Analytics uses cookies and tracks activity. You can configure your browser to block tracking cookies if you wish.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your data:
userRights.item1: Access: You can view all your data at any time through the application
userRights.item2: Edit: You can edit or delete any of your data
userRights.item3: Export: You can export your data to various formats (CSV, Excel, PDF)
userRights.item4: Deletion: You can delete your account and all associated data at any time

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have questions or concerns about the privacy policy, please contact us:
